Direct message the job poster from Harnham
Cara Tressider
Recruitment Consultant- Machine Learning at Harnham
Director of Machine LearningFinancial ServicesNew Jersey$230,000k-$300,000k base + bonus + extremely strong benefits You will work with one of the world's largest financial institutions as an influential member of their ML team. You will act as both a technical leader and a project leader to help the company solve difficult problems and to come up with groundbreaking solutions. The RoleAs Manager of Machine Learning, you will be required to:Act as a technical lead and project lead (this is a very hands-on role)Be an expert coding in PythonKnow how programming and API building should be done Your Skills and ExperienceThe successful Machine Learning Engineer will have the following skills and experience:Must be an expert in codingVast experience putting models into productionExperience working in financial services is a plusVast experience in computer programming work experience with proven, high-value results.Vast commercial experience in data science, machine learning, or data engineering work experience. The BenefitsA competitive base salary of $230,000-$300,000+ benefits + sizable equity KEYWORDSData Science | Engineering | Natural Language Processing | Machine Learning | start-up | Python | Marketing & Advertising | Software Engineering | Natural Language Understanding | Natural Language Generation
